body: I shot someone before the walls fell and I got a warning I have seen tons of players do this and get no infractions why did I not get a chat warning now this is on my record D:

title: Did I really need an infractions  for this.

replies.body:
1. Do not intentionally take advantage of server exploits that give you an advantage of other players. Doing so results in a severe punishment. Instead, we highly encourage you to email support@avicus.net with details regarding the potential server exploit.
They don't list every server exploit.

Exploit:
"to use (someone or something) in a way that helps you unfairly" - http://www.merriam-webster.com/
"I shot someone before the walls fell" - 99250
The other person that he shot can shoot back, so it's not unfair. Done. KTHXBAI

replies.body: Players should know if it is an exploit. For example glitching in the Venemous TDM axe and bow into another game is a exploit because it isn't part of the map and you have to do something to get it. Or, managing to get ahead of everyone in Minotaur in Avicade at the start. Shooting someone in walls is less clear i understand but it is still not allowed and whatever you got, a warn or a kick, this should not affect your staff app. An idea for the community would be to help the staff find exploits and not abuse them.
replies.body_tagged: Players should know if it is an exploit. For example glitching in the Venemous TDM axe and bow into another game is a exploit because it isn't part of the map and you have to do something to get it. Or, managing to get ahead of everyone in Minotaur in Avicade at the start. Shooting someone in walls is less clear i understand but it is still not allowed and whatever you got, a warn or a kick, this should not affect your staff app. An idea for the community would be to help the staff find exploits and not abuse them.
